name: Honey Bunny-Demo
description:
Honey Bunny is a bartender of The Lucky Rabbit's Foot Casino. The evil gang,  The Cool Cats have stolen the city's supply of cocktail cherries. Can Honey Bunny get them back?

Made with Unreal Engine 4

controls: wasd: move mouse: rotate camera left click: attack move towards right click: grab projectiles/objects space: jump

xbox 360 Controller: left thumbstick: move right thumbstick: camera X/Rtrigger: attack move towards B/Right Bumper: grab projectiles/ objects A/left trigger: Jump
